name: MPSC Daily Current Events
description: Features:-  * Total Offline App. Internet Connection is Only required for Regular Updates. Once Notes MPSC Current Affairs Downloaded in App then You Can Read it Offline.   * Current Affairs App in Marathi  * Total Free App. We Dont Charge Any Hidden Fee   * Daily Updates. (Regular Daily Update Size is less than 50KB Per Day)   * Download Available Download Section is Available for Students. Maharashtra Lokseva Aayog Previous Year Question Papers , Maharashtra Public Service Commission Exam Material , Chalu Ghadamodi , Books . Students can Download Various Notes in PDF Format in their Device. They can Take the Printout of those Notes.  This is current affairs app . Its Useful for ias preparation , bank exam preparation , mpsc exam preparation , clerk exam preparation , ssc exam preparation , railway exam , bank preparation . So this is complete exam preparation app with Good general knowledge app. In this App User will get daily current affairs and gk .  There are Lot of competitive exam apps , general awareness app , gk apps in english , current affairs quiz app , exam paper app , upsc exam app . But Our App is Unique in All Features.
